segments.text: From reading over your resume , I assume your English is quite good . Have you had any experience in the writing field ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t had any professional experience , but I have always been interested in creative writing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever had a foreign instructor in English composition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my college teacher was an Australian . She was also our adviser on our English language newspaper . I was the editor for two years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s very interesting . Tell me what you did exactly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I planned the layout of the newspaper and then I assigned various articles and columns to other students to write . I wrote the editorial each time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your aim in going into the field of journalism ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be frank with you , I would like nothing better than to be an overseas reporter some day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That can be a rough job , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know that . But I like adventure and excitement in my writing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , working in an editorial office may not be exciting enough for you . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be glad to do routine work sometimes , if I could be assured of making advancements in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this type of position would be a very good start for you . I am quite sure we can work something out for you , but I cannot give you a definite answer today . We will let you know within just a few days .
segments.speaker: S1
